text: El Charco Airport is an airport serving the Tapaje River town of El Charco in the Nariño Department of Colombia. The runway parallels the river, upstream of the town. ==See also== * * *Transport in Colombia *List of airports in Colombia ==References== ==External links== *OurAirports - El Charco *FallingRain - El Charco Airport *HERE/Nokia - El Charco Category:Airports in Colombia Category:Colombia transport-related lists
title: El Charco Airport
